des: "The best salad dressing in the universe! Kids love it. Great on meats, rice, and any green salad. I always get requests for this recipe."
ins: Blend maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, garlic, dry mustard, salt, basil, and black pepper in a blender until smooth; stream olive oil into the mixture while blending and continue blending until dressing is thick and creamy.
